intro_title: Environmentally Friendly Production and Sustainable Recycling
intro_description: MT MAKINA shredding machines, offering high efficiency in industrial waste management and recycling processes, ensure effective shredding of various materials with their durable structure and powerful blade systems. The systems produced for many materials such as tire, metal, plastic, wood, textile, household and industrial waste, contribute to reducing waste volume and efficient use of resources by providing sustainable recycling solutions. For detailed information about MT MAKINA shredding machines that offer high performance and long-lasting use with models designed for special needs, please contact us.

single_shaft_faq_q1: WHAT IS A SINGLE SHAFT SHREDDER USED FOR?
single_shaft_faq_a1: A single shaft shredder is an industrial machine designed to effectively shred various materials, operating with a combination of high torque and low speed. It is used in recycling, waste management and industrial applications.
single_shaft_faq_q2: WHAT MATERIALS CAN BE PROCESSED IN SINGLE SHAFT SHREDDERS?
single_shaft_faq_a2: Various materials can be processed such as textile waste, plastics, fiber films, wood, chipboard, MDF boards, household waste and municipal waste.
single_shaft_faq_q3: HOW DO SINGLE SHAFT SHREDDERS WORK?
single_shaft_faq_a3: Our machines shred materials with blades rotating around a main shaft operating at high torque and low speed. Materials are cut by the blades on the shaft and separated into small pieces.
single_shaft_faq_q4: WHAT ARE THE ENERGY-SAVING FEATURES OF SINGLE SHAFT SHREDDERS?
single_shaft_faq_a4: It provides low energy consumption with energy-efficient motors and special blade design. Additionally, the motor automatically shuts off if no material is fed for a certain period of time.
single_shaft_faq_a5: Our machines are covered by a 2-year mechanical warranty. We also offer a 10-year spare parts supply warranty.
single_shaft_faq_q6: DO YOU PROVIDE INSTALLATION AND TRAINING?
single_shaft_faq_a6: Yes, installation and operator training are provided free of charge by our expert technical team.
single_shaft_faq_q7: HOW IS SERVICE AND SPARE PARTS SUPPORT PROVIDED?
single_shaft_faq_a7: We have a worldwide service network. We guarantee service intervention within 24 hours in Turkey and 48-72 hours internationally.
single_shaft_faq_q8: WHAT IS THE PRODUCTION AND DELIVERY TIME?
single_shaft_faq_a8: Average production time for standard models is 4-6 weeks. For special projects, it may take 8-10 weeks.
single_shaft_faq_q9: WHAT SAFETY MEASURES DOES THE MACHINE HAVE?
single_shaft_faq_a9: All our machines comply with CE standards. Emergency stop buttons, hopper sensors, and PLC-controlled automatic reverse (anti-jam) systems are standard.
single_shaft_faq_q10: DO YOU MANUFACTURE CUSTOM CAPACITIES AND SIZES?
single_shaft_faq_a10: Yes, we can design and manufacture machines in custom sizes and capacities according to your project needs.
dual_shaft_faq_title: Frequently Asked Questions - Dual Shaft Shredder
dual_shaft_faq_q1: WHAT MATERIALS ARE DUAL SHAFT SHREDDERS SUITABLE FOR?
dual_shaft_faq_a1: Dual shaft machines are ideal for shredding tough and bulky materials such as metal, tires, electronic waste (e-waste), drums and rigid plastics.
dual_shaft_faq_q2: WHAT IS THE DIFFERENCE FROM A SINGLE SHAFT MACHINE?
dual_shaft_faq_a2: Dual shaft machines operate at lower speeds but much higher torque. They work on the principle of tearing and shearing rather than cutting, making them more suitable for hard materials like metal.
dual_shaft_faq_a3: Maintenance requirements are low thanks to the automatic lubrication system. Blade condition should be checked periodically. Maintenance schedules can be tracked via the PLC screen.
dual_shaft_faq_q4: WHAT MATERIAL ARE THE BLADES MADE OF?
dual_shaft_faq_a4: Our blades are made of special alloy, heat-treated and hardened steel. They are extremely resistant to wear.
dual_shaft_faq_a5: Our machines are covered by a 2-year mechanical warranty. We also offer a 10-year spare parts supply warranty.
dual_shaft_faq_q6: DO YOU PROVIDE INSTALLATION AND TRAINING?
dual_shaft_faq_a6: Yes, installation and operator training are provided free of charge by our expert technical team.
dual_shaft_faq_q7: HOW IS SERVICE AND SPARE PARTS SUPPORT PROVIDED?
dual_shaft_faq_a7: We have a worldwide service network. We guarantee service intervention within 24 hours in Turkey and 48-72 hours internationally.
dual_shaft_faq_q8: WHAT IS THE PRODUCTION AND DELIVERY TIME?
dual_shaft_faq_a8: Average production time for standard models is 4-6 weeks. For special projects, it may take 8-10 weeks.
dual_shaft_faq_q9: WHAT SAFETY MEASURES DOES THE MACHINE HAVE?
dual_shaft_faq_a9: All our machines comply with CE standards. Emergency stop buttons, hopper sensors, and PLC-controlled automatic reverse (anti-jam) systems are standard.
dual_shaft_faq_q10: DO YOU MANUFACTURE CUSTOM CAPACITIES AND SIZES?
dual_shaft_faq_a10: Yes, we can design and manufacture machines in custom sizes and capacities according to your project needs.
quad_shaft_faq_title: Frequently Asked Questions - Quad Shaft Shredder
quad_shaft_faq_q1: WHY CHOOSE A QUAD SHAFT SHREDDER?
quad_shaft_faq_a1: Quad shaft machines are preferred when you want to reduce material size to a specific dimension (e.g., using a screen) in a single pass. Ideal for applications requiring homogeneous sizing.
quad_shaft_faq_q2: WHAT IS THE ADVANTAGE OF A QUAD SHAFT MACHINE?
quad_shaft_faq_a2: Thanks to its design that repeatedly directs material to the blades, it provides high efficiency and prevents material accumulation on shafts, ensuring continuous flow.
quad_shaft_faq_a3: Yes, our quad shaft machines feature an interchangeable screen system that ensures shredded material exits at the desired size.
quad_shaft_faq_a4: Widely used in sectors requiring precise sizing such as electronic waste recycling, sensitive document destruction, medical waste processing and RDF production.
quad_shaft_faq_a5: Our machines are covered by a 2-year mechanical warranty. We also offer a 10-year spare parts supply warranty.
quad_shaft_faq_q6: DO YOU PROVIDE INSTALLATION AND TRAINING?
quad_shaft_faq_a6: Yes, installation and operator training are provided free of charge by our expert technical team.
quad_shaft_faq_q7: HOW IS SERVICE AND SPARE PARTS SUPPORT PROVIDED?
quad_shaft_faq_a7: We have a worldwide service network. We guarantee service intervention within 24 hours in Turkey and 48-72 hours internationally.

quad_shaft_faq_a8: Average production time for standard models is 4-6 weeks. For special projects, it may take 8-10 weeks.

quad_shaft_faq_q10: DO YOU MANUFACTURE CUSTOM CAPACITIES AND SIZES?

metal_faq_q1: WHAT METALS CAN THE METAL SHREDDER PROCESS?
metal_faq_a1: It can process many ferrous and non-ferrous metals such as aluminum, copper, iron, steel turnings, metal sheets, drums and electronic waste.
metal_faq_q2: CAN IT SHRED COMLETE CAR BODIES?
metal_faq_a2: Our large-scale industrial models (RDM Series) possess the capacity and power to shred large metal structures like complete car bodies and chassis.
metal_faq_a3: We provide separation of ferrous and non-ferrous metals with optional magnetic separators and Eddy Current systems integrated into discharge conveyors.
metal_faq_q4: WHAT IS THE LIFESPAN OF THE BLADES?
metal_faq_a4: Our metal shredding blades are specially hardened and have a segmented design. Depending on usage, blades can be sharpened or individually replaced, reducing operating costs.
metal_faq_a5: Our machines are covered by a 2-year mechanical warranty. We also offer a 10-year spare parts supply warranty.

pallet_faq_q1: DOES THE PALLET SHREDDER SHRED NAILS TOO?
pallet_faq_a1: Yes, our machines are designed to seamlessly shred nails and screws on pallets and then separate them with a magnetic separator.
pallet_faq_q2: HOW MANY PALLETS CAN IT PROCESS PER HOUR?
pallet_faq_a2: Capacity varies by model. Our TSH-100 model processes about 50-80 pallets per hour, while our industrial series can go up to 300-400 pallets per hour.
pallet_faq_q3: WHAT IS THE OUTPUT PRODUCT USED FOR?
pallet_faq_a3: Shredded pallets (wood chips) can be used as fuel in biomass power plants, raw material in chipboard/MDF production or as mulch in landscaping.
pallet_faq_a4: Yes, automatic conveyor systems and hydraulic pusher (ram) systems are offered as options to feed pallets into the machine.
pallet_faq_a5: Our machines are covered by a 2-year mechanical warranty. We also offer a 10-year spare parts supply warranty.

pallet_faq_a8: Average production time for standard models is 4-6 weeks. For special projects, it may take 8-10 weeks.

pallet_faq_a9: All our machines comply with CE standards. Emergency stop buttons, hopper sensors, and PLC-controlled automatic reverse (anti-jam) systems are standard.

pallet_faq_a10: Yes, we can design and manufacture machines in custom sizes and capacities according to your project needs.
harddisk_faq_a1: Yes, our machines physically shred disks into small pieces (shredding), making data retrieval impossible. Compliant with KVKK/GDPR standards.
harddisk_faq_q2: CAN IT SHRED SS AND USB DRIVES?
harddisk_faq_a2: Absolutely. It can shred not just HDDs but SSDs, USB drives, CDs/DVDs, tapes, credit cards and phones.
harddisk_faq_q3: HOW LONG DOES THE PROCESS TAKE?
harddisk_faq_a3: Our DATABER series can destroy 100-500 disks per hour depending on the model. Destruction takes seconds.
harddisk_faq_q4: IS IT SUITABLE FOR OFFICE USE?
harddisk_faq_a4: Yes, our office models operate quietly (65-70 dB) and have dust filtration, making them safe for office environments. 220V models available.
harddisk_faq_a5: 2-year mechanical warranty and 10-year spare parts availability guarantee.
harddisk_faq_a6: Yes, on-site setup and operator training are included.
harddisk_faq_q7: IS THERE CAMERA RECORDING AND REPORTING?
harddisk_faq_a7: Optional camera systems and barcode readers can record and report every destroyed disk.
harddisk_faq_a8: Standard models are in stock or 2-3 weeks. Special projects 6-8 weeks.
harddisk_faq_a9: Automatic stop when cover opens, emergency stop, overload protection.
harddisk_faq_a10: Yes, we can manufacture custom sizes and capacities.
wood_faq_q1: WHAT WOOD TYPES CAN IT GRIND?
wood_faq_a1: Pine, oak, beech, pallets, MDF, chipboard, plywood, construction molds, and all forestry waste.
wood_faq_a2: Yes, robust blades handle nails/screws. Magnets separate them at the output.
wood_faq_q3: IS IT SUITABLE FOR WET WOOD?
wood_faq_a3: Yes, up to 40-50% moisture content is fine. Very wet materials need special sieves.
wood_faq_a4: Bolted design allows easy modification, sharpening, and 4-way usage.
wood_faq_a6: Free expert installation and training included.

wood_faq_a10: Yes, we build custom engineered solutions.

glass_faq_a1: Bottles, jars, window glass, car windshields (laminated), vials and industrial glass waste.
glass_faq_a2: Yes, integrated suction and separation units can remove paper, plastic caps and metals from the crushed glass.
glass_faq_a3: Typically reduces volume by 75-80%. Output can be adjusted from sand-like texture to larger shards.

tree_root_main_title: Step Towards a Greener Future with Tree Root Shredder
tree_root_subtitle: High Performance Solution for Shredding Tree Roots, Woody Waste and Scrap Wood
tree_root_description_1: Today, waste management and recycling processes are of great importance in terms of conservation of natural resources and environmental sustainability. Tree root shredder plays a critical role in these processes by enabling efficient shredding of tree roots, woody waste and scrap wood. MT Makina is making a breakthrough in waste management by offering high performance, durability and user-friendly solutions with its innovative tree root shredding machine. Tree root shredder combines high performance and durability with its multi-blade rotor structure. Feeding teeth mounted on the feeding hopper ensure materials are processed at the desired speed. When the rotor is overloaded, the feeding hopper rotates in the reverse direction to prevent jamming and ensures continuous operation of the root shredding machine.
tree_root_description_2: Tree root shredder is equipped with high torque and low speed combination, enabling fast and effective shredding of materials. Its high energy efficiency motors reduce operating costs and minimize environmental impact. Thanks to its durable structure and long-lasting blades, it provides long-term and uninterrupted use. Tree root shredding machine allows operators to easily use the machine with user-friendly control panels. Feeding teeth mounted on the inner wall of the feeding hopper rotate the feeding hopper in the reverse direction when the rotor is overloaded, preventing jamming and ensuring uninterrupted operation.
tree_root_description_3: Tree root shredder is an industrial machine that supports environmental sustainability. It plays an important role in processing woody waste with its high efficiency, long-lasting blades, low noise level and user-friendly design. Mobile tree root shredder provides great advantages in areas such as agriculture and forest management thanks to its design that can be used in different locations. It offers on-site flexibility with its mobile crusher feature and provides environmentally sensitive solutions. Tree root shredding machine prices may vary according to user needs. You can contribute to environmental sustainability by optimizing waste management processes with root shredding machine and wood shredding machine. Wood shredder and wood grinding machines offer effective solutions in recycling waste, providing businesses with both cost and environmental advantages.
tree_root_application_desc: Tree root shredder stands out with its wide range of applications. Tree root shredding machine can process not only tree roots and woody waste, but also various recycling materials such as scrap wood, timber, pallets, MDF, chipboard, wood waste and straw bales. This flexibility allows tree root shredding machine to be used in various industries and provides great advantages in waste management processes.
tree_root_application_desc2: Tree root shredding machine offers innovative and effective solutions in recycling and waste management processes. With its high efficiency, durability and user-friendly features, tree root shredding machine supports environmental sustainability in processing tree roots and woody waste. Tree root shredding machine developed by MT Makina makes significant contributions to environmental sustainability by increasing efficiency in waste management. With the goal of leaving a cleaner and greener world for the future, tree root shredding machine opens the door to a new era in waste management.
tree_root_application_desc3: Mobile tree root shredder provides great advantages in areas such as agriculture and forest management by offering the possibility of use in different locations. It offers flexible working conditions with its mobile crusher feature. Additionally, wood shredding machine and wood shredding machine provide high efficiency in waste management processes. Tree root shredding machine prices and root shredding machine prices may vary according to the features of the machine and make important contributions to recycling processes.
tree_root_adv_1_desc: Effectively shreds tree roots and woody waste with its multi-blade rotor structure. Provides superior performance with high torque and low speed combination.
tree_root_adv_2_desc: Reduces operating costs and minimizes environmental impact with its high energy efficiency motors. Offers optimized power consumption.
tree_root_adv_3_desc: When the rotor is overloaded, the feeding hopper rotates in reverse direction to prevent jamming. Ensures uninterrupted operation and increases operational efficiency.
tree_root_adv_4_desc: Enables operators to easily use the machine with user-friendly control panels. Guarantees materials are processed at the desired speed with feeding teeth.
tw100_feature_1_desc: Ø 1000 mm shredding area and 132-160 kW power make it perfect for medium-scale forest management and municipal park operations.
tw100_feature_2_desc: 500 mm rotor length offers maximum efficiency in compact structure. Delivers high performance even in limited spaces.
tw100_feature_3_desc: Energy-efficient motor technology and automatic jam prevention system provide low maintenance and operating costs.
tw150_feature_1_desc: Ø 1500 mm shredding area and 160-220 kW power provide powerful solution for large forest operations and industrial recycling facilities.
tw150_feature_2_desc: 800 mm rotor length and optional mobile tracked design enable flexible use in different locations.
tw150_feature_3_desc: Real-time load monitoring and automatic reverse function minimize operator intervention.
tw200_feature_1_desc: Ø 2000 mm shredding area and 220-315 kW ultra-powerful motor deliver maximum industrial-scale processing capacity.
tw200_feature_2_desc: 1000 mm rotor length, Siemens PLC and SCADA system offer remote monitoring and maintenance tracking modules.
tw200_feature_3_desc: Complete solution with full automatic line integration, magnetic separator and different screen systems. CE certified to EU standards.

single_shaft_subtitle: High Efficiency and Powerful Performance Across Wide Range of Waste
single_shaft_description_1: MT Makina Single Shaft Shredder is one of the most powerful solutions developed for industrial waste management and recycling facilities. This high-torque industrial shredder precisely processes tough materials such as plastic lumps, hard plastics, paper rolls, textile waste, cables, aluminum, and wooden pallets. For businesses looking for a waste shredding machine, it offers continuous operating performance with its energy-saving hydraulic pusher (Hydraulic Ram) system and durable rotor structure.
single_shaft_description_2: Featuring leading technologies in the recycling machine sector, this model is equipped with a smart PLC automation system. When the machine is overloaded (Overload), it activates the automatic reverse (Auto-Reverse) function to prevent blade damage and jams. Also known as a plastic crushing machine and scrap shredding machine, this system reduces maintenance costs and maximizes operational efficiency.
single_shaft_description_3: Fully compliant with industrial shredding machine needs, our single shaft crushers feature rotor options ranging from 800 mm to 1500 mm. Thanks to the interchangeable screen system, it allows you to obtain granules of the desired size. Ideal for solid waste shredding plants, biomass plants, and plastic recycling lines, this shredder machine adds value to your business with its long-lasting use and high capacity.
single_shaft_advantages_title: Single Shaft Solid Waste Shredder Advantages
single_shaft_adv_1_desc: Powerful and stable performance even in heavy-duty materials.
single_shaft_adv_2_desc: Intelligent system preventing jams, long-lasting blades.
single_shaft_performance_title: Maximum Performance and Efficiency in Single Shaft Shredders
single_shaft_description_1: MT Makina Single Shaft Shredder is one of the most powerful solutions developed for industrial waste management and recycling facilities. This high-torque industrial shredder precisely processes tough materials such as plastic lumps, hard plastics, paper rolls, textile waste, cables, aluminum, and wooden pallets.
single_shaft_description_2: Featuring leading technologies in the recycling machine sector, this model is equipped with a smart PLC automation system. When the machine is overloaded, it activates the automatic reverse (Auto-Reverse) function to prevent blade damage and jams.
single_shaft_description_3: Fully compliant with industrial shredding machine needs, our single shaft crushers feature rotor options ranging from 800 mm to 1500 mm. Thanks to the interchangeable screen system, it allows you to obtain granules of the desired size.
single_shaft_description_4: Single shaft shredder is a powerful and efficient system designed to shred a wide range of materials. This machine offers high performance in processing plastic, wood, rubber, paper-cardboard and light metal waste. Playing a critical role in industrial waste management and recycling processes, single shaft shredder reduces materials to desired size with high-speed cutting principle.
single_shaft_description_5: MT Makina single shaft shredder can be customized according to the needs of different sectors thanks to its modular structure. With high torque motor system and durable blade design, it provides uninterrupted production even in harsh working conditions. PLC controlled automation system maximizes operator safety and process efficiency.
single_shaft_description_6: Ideal for plastic recycling facilities, paper-cardboard processing centers, wood waste management facilities and RDF production lines, single shaft shredder optimizes operating costs with low energy consumption and minimum maintenance requirements. CE certified safety standards fully comply with European norms. Contact MT Makina for a price quote!
quad_shaft_description_1: MT Makina Quad Shaft Shredder is designed with a screen system that recirculates the shredded material within the system until it reaches a specific size. These models are designed especially for sensitive recycling processes requiring homogeneous particle size.
quad_shaft_description_2: Thanks to the synchronized operation of four bladed shafts, material escape is prevented and excellent shredding performance is delivered. Ideal for electronic waste, confidential document destruction, and RDF production.
quad_shaft_description_3: Our quad shaft shredders have intelligent Auto-Reverse and Anti-Jamming systems in case of overload. With its high torque electric motors and durable gearbox structure, it can operate 24/7 without interruption.
quad_shaft_description_4: The quad shaft solid waste shredder adapts to various industrial applications such as tire shredder, bale shredder, pallet shredder, wood shredder, electronic waste shredder, and HDD shredder.
quad_shaft_description_5: MT Makina quad shaft shredder offers high security and performance in HDD and hard disk destruction, paper-cardboard shredding, confidential document destruction and secure waste disposal applications. Thanks to modular blade system, it can be easily adapted to different material types.
quad_shaft_description_6: Optimized for data center security applications, government agencies confidential document destruction, banking sector and industrial RDF production lines, quad shaft shredder provides full integration into production processes with Industry 4.0 compatible automation infrastructure. Supported by CE and ISO certificates. Contact us for pricing!
metal_description_1: Metal recycling is of great importance in terms of environmental sustainability and economic efficiency. In this process, the scrap metal shredding machine plays a critical role. The dual shaft scrap metal shredder effectively shreds various types of metals, making them ready for recycling.
metal_description_2: The scrap metal shredding machine has the capacity to process different types of metals such as scrap iron, aluminum, stainless steel and metal bales. Redmonster scrap metal shredding machine consists of powerful machines designed to shred a wide range of metal scraps.
metal_description_3: Redmonster metal shredder offers innovative and effective solutions in metal recycling and waste management processes. With high efficiency, durability and user-friendly features, scrap metal shredder supports environmental sustainability in processing metal waste.
metal_description_4: Machines such as car shredder and scrap car shredder offer high performance especially in scrap car shredding processes. It has the capacity to process various metal types such as iron shredder and aluminum shredder. Scrap iron shredder provides high efficiency even in harsh working conditions.
metal_description_5: MT Makina Redmonster series metal shredders are equipped with Siemens PLC controlled automation, automatic lubrication system, and CE certified safety features. Available in RDM-100, RDM-150, RDM-180, and RDM-200 models for different capacity needs.
metal_description_6: Metal shredder prices and scrap iron shredder prices offer economical solutions for businesses. As Turkey's leading metal shredder manufacturer, MT Makina provides price quotes, turnkey recycling facility solutions, and 24/7 technical support. Contact our professional team for your metal recycling project!

dual_shaft_seo_p1: Dual shaft shredder is a professional system that offers superior performance in shredding heavy and challenging materials. The two-shaft cutting mechanism enables effective processing of plastic, tires, electronic waste, wooden pallets and mixed waste. Operating with low speed-high torque principle, dual shaft shredder easily shreds even the toughest materials.
dual_shaft_seo_p2: MT Makina dual shaft shredder grabs and shreds material in a controlled manner with two rotors rotating in opposite directions. This feature provides great advantage especially in processing flexible and elastic materials. Hydraulic pusher system guarantees continuous feeding and minimizes clogging risk.
dual_shaft_seo_p3: Optimized for tire recycling facilities, e-waste processing centers, pallet shredding facilities and industrial waste management centers, dual shaft shredder can be easily integrated into existing production lines thanks to its modular structure. MT Makina, Turkey's leading shredder manufacturer, provides technical consultancy and after-sales support services.
quad_shaft_seo_p1: Quad shaft shredder is an advanced technology system designed for applications requiring precise particle size control. With four rotor system, it shreds material in multiple stages and provides homogeneous output size. It is an ideal solution for RDF production, industrial waste processing and recycling facilities.
quad_shaft_seo_p2: MT Makina quad shaft shredder offers high security and performance in HDD and hard disk destruction, paper-cardboard shredding, confidential document destruction and secure waste disposal applications. Thanks to modular blade system, it can be easily adapted to different material types and maintenance times are minimized.
quad_shaft_seo_p3: Optimized for data center security applications, government agencies confidential document destruction, banking sector and industrial RDF production lines, quad shaft shredder provides full integration into production processes with Industry 4.0 compatible automation infrastructure. Supported by CE and ISO certificates.

This process accelerates the classification and recycling of metals.
metal_seo_p2: Scrap metal shredder offers innovative and effective solutions in metal recycling and waste management processes. With high efficiency, durability and user-friendly features, scrap metal shredder supports environmental sustainability in processing metal waste. Redmonster series optimizes enterprises' waste management processes and minimizes negative environmental impacts.

dual_shaft_subtitle: High Torque, Low Speed Solution for Tough Industrial Waste
dual_shaft_description_1: MT Makina Double Shaft Shredder is the most critical equipment in industrial waste management processes. Operating on the principle of low speed high torque, this machine shreds voluminous waste such as metal scrap, end-of-life tires (ELT), electronic waste (E-Waste), barrels, white goods and rigid plastics using shear technology. Our CS Series (CS-20, CS-40, CS-50, CS-100, CS-120 etc.) models can be configured specifically according to your business capacity needs (1 ton/hour - 20 tons/hour).
dual_shaft_description_2: The CS-20 and CS-40, which are the entry-level models of the dual shaft shredder family, are ideal especially for the destruction of medical waste, organic waste and light metal packaging. Larger industrial models such as CS-100 and CS-120 have the power to shred car bodies, truck tires and thick metal profiles. Counter-rotating special alloy blades process even the hardest materials without difficulty, ensuring maximum efficiency as a primary shredder in recycling facilities.
dual_shaft_description_3: Thanks to the modular blade design, maintenance and repair times are minimal. Indispensable for metal recycling facilities, Refuse Derived Fuel (RDF) preparation plants and tire granulation plants, this machine is an environmentally friendly technology with no dust emission and low noise level. The intelligent PLC automation system protects the machine and blades by performing Auto-Reverse in case of jamming.
dual_shaft_description_4: Machines such as recycling shredder, PET bottle shredder and bale shredder stand out with their capacity to process various materials such as plastic, metal, tire, wood, glass and household waste. Machines such as metal shredder, scrap iron shredder and scrap car shredder promote sustainability in industrial waste management. Additionally, shredder prices, metal shredder prices and scrap iron shredder prices offer economical solutions.
dual_shaft_description_5: The dual shaft shredder promotes environmental sustainability while providing high performance to businesses and becomes an indispensable tool in modern waste management.
dual_shaft_adv_1_desc: The dual shaft shredder can process various materials such as plastic, metal, wood, paper and medical waste.
dual_shaft_adv_2_desc: The dual shaft shredder effectively shreds tough materials with high torque and low speed.
dual_shaft_adv_3_desc: The dual shaft shredder provides long-lasting and efficient use with durable blade steels.
dual_shaft_adv_4_desc: Thanks to its modular design, the dual shaft shredder enables quick replacement of components, which reduces maintenance time.

quad_shaft_subtitle: Advanced Technology Solution for Electronic Waste and Precision Sizing
quad_shaft_description_1: MT Makina Quad Shaft Shredder is designed with a screen system that recirculates the shredded material within the system until it reaches a specific size. These models, named QS Series (QS-40, QS-60, QS-80, QS-100 etc.), are designed especially for sensitive recycling processes requiring homogeneous particle size. Thanks to the synchronized operation of four bladed shafts, material escape is prevented and excellent shredding performance is delivered.
quad_shaft_description_3: Our quad shaft shredders have intelligent Auto-Reverse and Anti-Jamming systems in case of overload. With its high torque electric motors and durable gearbox structure, it can operate 24/7 without interruption. By using it as a Secondary Shredder in medical waste sterilization facilities and RDF (Refuse Derived Fuel) preparation processes, it guarantees that the final size of the material meets the desired standards.
quad_shaft_description_4: The quad shaft solid waste shredder adapts to various industrial applications such as tire shredder, bale shredder, animal shredder, pallet shredder, wood shredder, scrap shredder, electronic waste shredder, HDD shredder. It is also ideal for different waste processing needs such as cardboard shredder, paper shredder, scrap tire shredder and hard disk destruction machine. The quad shaft solid waste shredder plays an important role in sustainable recycling processes by being used as a solid waste shredder and shredding machine, contributing to the environment by reducing waste volume.
quad_shaft_adv_1_desc: The quad shaft shredder shreds materials quickly and effectively thanks to hydraulic pressure applied to the shafts.
quad_shaft_adv_2_desc: The quad shaft shredder increases operational efficiency by processing wide materials quickly and efficiently.
quad_shaft_adv_3_desc: The quad shaft shredder is ideal for large and challenging materials, easily processing bulky waste.
quad_shaft_adv_4_desc: The quad shaft shredder can process many different materials such as plastic, metal, wood and electronic waste.
wood_subtitle: High Capacity Industrial Solutions for MDF, Chipboard, Logs and Forest Waste
wood_description_1: Our tree shredding and grinding machines process large diameter logs, roots, MDF boards, chipboards and industrial wood waste at high speed, turning them into chips and sawdust of desired size. Provides ideal raw material production for biomass power plants and pellet facilities.
wood_description_2: Thanks to its powerful rotor structure and special design blade technology, it shreds all kinds of wet or dry wood waste without difficulty. Offers the most suitable configuration for your facility with horizontal and vertical feeding options. PLC controlled intelligent feeding system saves energy by optimizing motor load.
wood_description_3: MT Makina wood grinders are designed for the forest products industry, furniture factories and recycling facilities. Offers a clean working environment with high efficiency dust extraction system integration. Output size can be precisely adjusted with replaceable screen system.
wood_adv_1_desc: Continuous tree and log grinding capacity from 3 tons to 30 tons per hour.
wood_adv_2_desc: Quality chip and sawdust production in standard sizes with advanced screen technology.
wood_adv_3_desc: PLC system providing overload protection, automatic reverse and instant performance monitoring.
wood_adv_4_desc: Long service life with Hardox armored body and heat-treated special alloy blades.
glass_subtitle: Innovation in Waste Management with Glass Bottle Crusher
glass_description_1: Waste management and recycling are of great importance for environmental sustainability today. The glass bottle crusher offers an effective and innovative solution as glass bottles require special attention in the recycling process. MT Makina provides advanced technology solutions in waste management with the liquid separating glass bottle crusher developed for this need.
glass_description_2: The liquid separating glass bottle crusher ensures efficiency in recycling processes with its user-friendly design. After glass bottles are placed in the machine, the liquids inside are safely separated and the bottles are crushed. The separated liquids and crushed glass pieces are collected in separate compartments for disposal. Thus, the machine performs recycling quietly and efficiently without harming the environment.
glass_description_3: This innovative process offers a more sustainable path in waste management and recycling. Glass crusher machines play a critical role in the recycling and reuse of glass bottle waste. While offering an environmentally friendly solution effectively, it also supports the economic side of recycling processes.
glass_description_4: Scrap glass bottles can be reused in recycling facilities through the crushing process. The glass crushing machine price is determined depending on the machine's capacity and technical specifications. Businesses can reduce empty glass bottle collection costs by 80% using the glass bottle crusher.
glass_description_5: The glass bottle crusher can be used indoors such as offices with optimized noise levels. Offering environmentally friendly, cost-reducing and volume-minimizing features, it is an ideal solution for businesses. It has a wide usage area especially for bars, clubs, restaurants, hotels and catering establishments.
glass_adv_1_desc: The glass bottle crusher safely empties the liquid into a separate chamber after crushing liquid-filled bottles.
glass_adv_2_desc: Reduces operating costs with high energy efficiency motor systems and offers optimized noise levels.
glass_adv_3_desc: The machine provides long-lasting use and resistance to wear thanks to its high-quality steel blades.
glass_adv_4_desc: Provides different shredding sizes with adjustable screen system. Our CK and CKS series models offer smooth operation.
pallet_main_title: Pallet Shredder: Efficient Solutions for Wood and Plastic Pallet Recycling
pallet_subtitle: Essential equipment that provides environmental sustainability and efficient waste management in the recycling process of wooden and plastic pallets.
pallet_description_1: Pallet shredder is essential equipment that provides environmental sustainability and efficient waste management in the recycling process of wooden and plastic pallets. The pallet crusher accelerates the recycling process and facilitates waste management by breaking pallets into small pieces.
pallet_description_2: Pallets used in logistics and storage processes can create large amounts of pallet scrap when they reach the end of their service life. The pallet shredder offers an environmentally conscious solution by recycling these wastes and contributes to the conservation of natural resources.
pallet_description_3: Pallet shredder plays an active role in processes such as wood pallet recycling, plastic pallet recycling and scrap pallet recycling. It also facilitates scrap pallet for sale operations.
pallet_advantage_1_desc: In the TSV-Series, there is a single main shaft that grinds the materials. The shaft rotates at high torque and low speed, ensuring effective shredding of pallets.
pallet_adv_1_desc: In the TSV-Series, there is a single main shaft that grinds the materials. The shaft rotates at high torque and low speed, ensuring effective shredding of pallets.
pallet_advantage_2_desc: The pallet shredder can effectively shred wood, plastic and metal pallets, providing flexibility in recycling.
pallet_adv_2_desc: The pallet shredder can effectively shred wood, plastic and metal pallets, providing flexibility in recycling.
pallet_advantage_3_desc: The pallet shredder is equipped with durable components and withstands harsh working conditions for a long time.
pallet_adv_3_desc: The pallet shredder is equipped with durable components and withstands harsh working conditions for a long time.
pallet_advantage_4_desc: The mobile pallet shredder option provides flexibility to be used in different sites, thus achieving more efficiency on the job site.
pallet_adv_4_desc: The mobile pallet shredder option provides flexibility to be used in different sites, thus achieving more efficiency on the job site.
pallet_faq_1_q: WHAT IS A PALLET SHREDDER USED FOR?
pallet_faq_1_a: A pallet shredder is an industrial device that enables wooden and plastic pallets to be separated into small pieces. These machines play an important role in pallet recycling and waste management processes.
pallet_faq_2_q: WHAT ARE THE MAIN ADVANTAGES OF PALLET SHREDDERS?
pallet_faq_2_a: Pallet shredders provide high efficiency, energy savings, low operating costs and environmental sustainability. In addition, these machines offer long-lasting use with their robust structures and durable blades.
pallet_faq_3_q: WHAT TYPES OF PALLETS CAN PALLET SHREDDERS PROCESS?
pallet_faq_3_a: Pallet shredders can process both wooden and plastic pallets. They can also effectively shred pallets containing metals such as nails.
pallet_faq_4_q: WHAT ARE THE ADVANTAGES OF MOBILE PALLET SHREDDERS?
pallet_faq_4_a: Mobile pallet shredders provide easy portability in the field and allow on-site shredding. These machines are designed to handle hard materials in large loads and can be equipped with accessories such as cross belt magnets that can separate metal materials.
pallet_faq_5_q: WHAT IS THE ENERGY EFFICIENCY OF PALLET SHREDDERS?
pallet_faq_5_a: Motors and systems that provide high energy efficiency reduce operating costs and reduce environmental impacts. These machines provide energy savings by operating at low speed with high torque.

harddisk_subtitle: Secure Data Destruction with Multi-Stage Shredding Technology
harddisk_description_1: Harddisk destruction shredders are industrial machines designed for the physical destruction of hard drives, SSDs, circuit boards and other digital storage devices. MT Makina DATABER series offers single, dual and triple stage shredding options to ensure data is permanently unrecoverable.
harddisk_description_2: These machines are equipped with PLC control systems, automatic feeding mechanisms, and hardened steel blades that can shred even the toughest electronic components. The multi-stage shredding process ensures complete data destruction by reducing materials to powder-like particles.
harddisk_description_3: MT Makina harddisk shredders are ideal for data centers, IT recycling facilities, government agencies, and organizations that require secure disposal of sensitive information. Optional features include cooling systems, automatic lubrication, camera recording, and barcode reading capabilities.
harddisk_adv_1_desc: The harddisk destruction shredder completely eliminates the possibility of data recovery by shredding hard drives twice.
harddisk_adv_2_desc: The harddisk destruction shredder physically shreds hard drives and circuit boards to ensure data becomes unrecoverable.
harddisk_adv_3_desc: The harddisk destruction shredder is resistant to wear with high-quality steel blades and provides long-term use.
harddisk_adv_4_desc: The harddisk destruction shredder can quickly process digital storage devices and circuit boards of different sizes and types.
mobile_subtitle: Recycle your waste effectively on-site with mobile shredding machines that offer superior performance on all types of terrain.
mobile_description_1: Mobile crushers and shredding machines are designed to optimize waste management processes and reduce logistics costs. This mobile shredding plant offers on-site recycling opportunities for a wide range of materials, from construction and demolition waste to forest waste.
mobile_description_2: Thanks to its powerful diesel engine and tracked undercarriage, these shredding machines operate uninterrupted even in the toughest terrain conditions, providing high-capacity crushing and grinding performance. Mobile shredder technology allows waste to be processed economically where it is, without the need for transportation.
mobile_description_3: Our mobile waste shredding solutions are an indispensable part of modern recycling projects. These machines, which save volume by reducing the size of waste such as metal, plastic, wood, rubble, construction waste, forest waste and industrial waste, help you save both time and fuel. Add value to your projects with our eco-friendly and high-efficiency mobile crushers.
mobile_description_4: TSM series single-shaft mobile crushers (TSM-150, TSM-300), with 1500-3000 mm rotor options and 400-600 HP motor power, provide high efficiency in shredding tree roots, wood waste, construction debris and mixed waste. CSM series dual-shaft mobile crushers (CSM-150, CSM-200) are ideal for heavy metal waste, tires, white goods and large volume industrial waste. With our competitive pricing policy on mobile crusher prices and mobile shredder machine prices, we offer economical solutions for your projects.
mobile_description_5: Mobile crusher machines are equipped with Siemens PLC controlled automation system, remote monitoring infrastructure, automatic lubrication system and safety sensors. Fleet management and performance monitoring is possible with GPS tracking system and telematic modules. Desired output size can be adjusted with replaceable screen system (50-150 mm). Can be integrated with magnetic separator, conveyor belt and dust suppression system. Supported by CE certified safety standards and 2-year warranty.
mobile_description_6: Mobile crushers and shredders providing sustainability in waste management optimize recycling processes to offer businesses high efficiency, logistics savings and environmental benefits. As Turkey's leading shredder manufacturer, MT Makina offers mobile crusher price quotes, turnkey mobile shredding plant solutions and 24/7 technical support services. Contact our professional consulting team for your mobile shredder, mobile waste crushing machine and on-site shredding projects.
mobile_adv_1_desc: Accelerates the recycling process by processing a wide range of materials quickly and effectively.
mobile_adv_2_desc: Easily portable on site and offers on-site shredding. This reduces logistics costs and labor requirements.
mobile_adv_3_desc: The mobile crusher, with its capacity to process different materials, is suitable for various industries.
mobile_adv_4_desc: The mobile crusher made of high quality steel offers long life and continuous operation.
mobile_crusher_faq_q1: WHAT MATERIALS CAN THE MOBILE CRUSHER PROCESS?
mobile_crusher_faq_a1: It can process a wide range of materials such as plastic, metal, rubber, wood, paper, textiles, electronic waste, construction and demolition waste, household waste, green waste, pallets and bales.
mobile_crusher_faq_q2: IN WHICH INDUSTRIES IS THE MOBILE CRUSHER USED?
mobile_crusher_faq_a2: It is used in various industries such as recycling facilities, waste management, construction and demolition projects, agriculture, forest management, municipal waste processing facilities and industrial waste management.
mobile_crusher_faq_q3: WHAT ARE THE MAINTENANCE REQUIREMENTS OF THE MOBILE CRUSHER?
mobile_crusher_faq_a3: It has low maintenance requirements with long maintenance intervals. Regular inspection and maintenance of blades and other components should be performed. Automatic lubrication units and hydraulic opening screen systems reduce maintenance time and costs.
mobile_crusher_faq_q4: CAN THE MOBILE CRUSHER BE CUSTOMIZED?
mobile_crusher_faq_a4: Yes, the machine can be customized with various blade configurations, sizes and additional features suitable for specific industry requirements and material types.
mobile_crusher_faq_q5: WHAT IS THE CAPACITY RANGE OF THE MOBILE CRUSHER?
mobile_crusher_faq_a5: The capacity range varies depending on the model. It is available in various capacities from small-scale operations to large-scale industrial applications.
mobile_crusher_faq_q6: HOW IS ENERGY EFFICIENCY ACHIEVED IN THE MOBILE CRUSHER?
mobile_crusher_faq_a6: Inverter-controlled motors and automatic reverse features increase energy efficiency and optimize machine performance. This provides high efficiency while reducing energy consumption.
mobile_crusher_faq_q7: WHAT ARE THE SAFETY FEATURES OF THE MOBILE CRUSHER?
mobile_crusher_faq_a7: It is equipped with safety measures such as emergency stop buttons, protective covers and automatic reverse features. These features ensure operator safety.
plastic_faq_a4: Yes, optional wet shredding systems are available for pre-washing dirty plastics during shredding.
tree_root_faq_q1: CAN THE TREE ROOT SHREDDER PROCESS ROOTS WITH SOIL?
tree_root_faq_a1: Yes, thanks to its specially designed low-speed, high-torque rotor structure, it can shred roots with soil, stones and mud without damaging the blades.
tree_root_faq_a2: Yes, we have diesel-powered models mounted on tracked or wheeled mobile chassis for working in forest areas and different sites.
tree_root_faq_q3: CAN THE OUTPUT BE USED IN BIOMASS PLANTS?
tree_root_faq_a3: Absolutely. The output from our machine provides ideal size and quality fuel (wood chips) raw material for biomass energy plants.
tree_root_faq_a4: In our diesel models, fuel savings are maximized by using new generation, low emission and high efficiency engines (Volvo, Scania, etc.).
tree_root_faq_a5: Our machines are covered by a 2-year mechanical warranty. We also offer a 10-year spare parts supply guarantee.
tree_root_faq_q6: DO YOU PROVIDE INSTALLATION AND OPERATOR TRAINING?
tree_root_faq_a6: Yes, machine installation is performed on-site by our expert technical team and detailed use/maintenance training is provided free of charge to your operators.
tree_root_faq_q7: HOW IS SPARE PARTS AND SERVICE SUPPORT PROVIDED?
tree_root_faq_a7: We have a worldwide service network. In emergencies, we guarantee service intervention within 24 hours in Turkey and 48-72 hours internationally.
tree_root_faq_q8: WHAT IS THE PRODUCTION AND DELIVERY TIME?
tree_root_faq_a8: Average production time for standard models is 4-6 weeks. Earlier delivery is possible depending on stock availability. For custom projects, it may take 8-10 weeks.
tree_root_faq_q9: WHAT SAFETY MEASURES DOES THE MACHINE HAVE?
tree_root_faq_a9: All our machines comply with CE standards. Emergency stop buttons, hopper safety sensors, safety switches on maintenance covers and PLC-controlled automatic reverse (anti-jam) system are standard.
tree_root_faq_q10: DO YOU MANUFACTURE CUSTOM CAPACITIES AND SIZES?
tree_root_faq_a10: Yes, we can design and manufacture machines in custom sizes and capacities according to your project needs. Our engineering team offers custom solutions.
